name: Removal Of Amsi Provider Reg Key
description: Remove the AMSI Provider registry key in HKLM\Software\Microsoft\AMSI to disable AMSI inspection
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:DeleteKey AND registry.path:(*\{2781761E\-28E0\-4109\-99FE\-B9D127C57AFE\} OR *\{A7C452EF\-8E9F\-42EB\-9F2B\-245613CA0DC9\}))`
